content.html: Battery just ran out on my mouse, and now I'm challenging myself to see how much of the rest of the day I can do on just the keyboard. Currently at one hour and counting, and Vimium is doing a lot of the heavy lifting!
content.value:
Battery just ran out on my mouse, and now I'm challenging myself to see how much of the rest of the day I can do on just the keyboard.

Currently at one hour and counting, and Vimium is doing a lot of the heavy lifting!
